codeGet:
select TWTVROLE_CODE code,  TWTVROLE_DESC description 
from twtvrole
where
 (:virtual_domain_id is null or
   TWTVROLE_CODE not in 
  (select role_name from virtual_domain_role where virtual_domain_id=:virtual_domain_id)
)
union
select 'GUEST', 'Guest (no authentication)'
from dual
order by 2
